text: We had a great time at Paul´s place. He´s an awesome host and makes the best banana bread! Nigel is a really nice fellow and it was fun walking him around Brooklyn. Paul gave a nice tour around. It´s just a short jump down to Brooklyn Bridge Park, which is really pretty especially at dusk. We can only recommend staying with Paul, we´ll be back as well :-)
listing_name: Spacious room in cozy Boerum Hill
